name: RogueDice: Rolling On Fate
description:
Rolling on Fate playing this minimalist rogue-like battler based on dice

Maybe in the future I will add a random combat generator and a leveling system.

By MrDrake (Programming)

Made in 10 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Thanks a lot, to all the creators of the amazing assets I used :

  • Fonts NicerNightie - https://unfilledflag.itch.io/nicer-nightie
  • Music https://opengameart.org/content/gb-exploring-the-dungeon-ii
  • Music https://opengameart.org/content/gameboy-fight-in-the-dungeon
